169/**
170 * Helper utility to build protocol buffer requests, or build components for protocol buffer
171 * requests.
172 */
173@InterfaceAudience.Private
174public final class RequestConverter {
175
176  private RequestConverter() {
177  }
178
179  // Start utilities for Client
180
181  /**
182   * Create a protocol buffer GetRequest for a client Get
183   * @param regionName the name of the region to get
184   * @param get        the client Get
185   * @return a protocol buffer GetRequest
186   */
187  public static GetRequest buildGetRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Get get)
188    throws IOException {
189    GetRequest.Builder builder = GetRequest.newBuilder();
190    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
191    builder.setRegion(region);
192    builder.setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(get));
193    return builder.build();
194  }
195
196  /**
197   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a client increment
198   * @return a mutate request
199   */
200  public static MutateRequest buildIncrementRequest(final byte[] regionName, final byte[] row,
201    final byte[] family, final byte[] qualifier, final long amount, final Durability durability,
202    long nonceGroup, long nonce) {
203    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
204    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
205    builder.setRegion(region);
206
207    MutationProto.Builder mutateBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
208    mutateBuilder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(row));
209    mutateBuilder.setMutateType(MutationType.INCREMENT);
210    mutateBuilder.setDurability(ProtobufUtil.toDurability(durability));
211    ColumnValue.Builder columnBuilder = ColumnValue.newBuilder();
212    columnBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(family));
213    QualifierValue.Builder valueBuilder = QualifierValue.newBuilder();
214    valueBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(Bytes.toBytes(amount)));
215    valueBuilder.setQualifier(
216      UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(qualifier == null ? HConstants.EMPTY_BYTE_ARRAY : qualifier));
217    valueBuilder.setTimestamp(HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP);
218    columnBuilder.addQualifierValue(valueBuilder.build());
219    mutateBuilder.addColumnValue(columnBuilder.build());
220    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
221      mutateBuilder.setNonce(nonce);
222    }
223    builder.setMutation(mutateBuilder.build());
224    if (nonceGroup != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
225      builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
226    }
227    return builder.build();
228  }
229
230  /**
231   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a conditioned put/delete/increment/append
232   * @return a mutate request
233   */
234  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final byte[] row,
235    final byte[] family, final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op, final byte[] value,
236    final Filter filter, final TimeRange timeRange, final Mutation mutation, long nonceGroup,
237    long nonce) throws IOException {
238    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
239    if (mutation instanceof Increment || mutation instanceof Append) {
240      builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, nonce))
241        .setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
242    } else {
243      builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation));
244    }
245    return builder.setRegion(buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName))
246      .setCondition(ProtobufUtil.toCondition(row, family, qualifier, op, value, filter, timeRange))
247      .build();
248  }
249
250  /**
251   * Create a protocol buffer MultiRequest for conditioned row mutations
252   * @return a multi request
253   */
254  public static ClientProtos.MultiRequest buildMultiRequest(final byte[] regionName,
255    final byte[] row, final byte[] family, final byte[] qualifier, final CompareOperator op,
256    final byte[] value, final Filter filter, final TimeRange timeRange,
257    final RowMutations rowMutations, long nonceGroup, long nonce) throws IOException {
258    return buildMultiRequest(regionName, rowMutations,
259      ProtobufUtil.toCondition(row, family, qualifier, op, value, filter, timeRange), nonceGroup,
260      nonce);
261  }
262
263  /**
264   * Create a protocol buffer MultiRequest for row mutations
265   * @return a multi request
266   */
267  public static ClientProtos.MultiRequest buildMultiRequest(final byte[] regionName,
268    final RowMutations rowMutations, long nonceGroup, long nonce) throws IOException {
269    return buildMultiRequest(regionName, rowMutations, null, nonceGroup, nonce);
270  }
271
272  private static ClientProtos.MultiRequest buildMultiRequest(final byte[] regionName,
273    final RowMutations rowMutations, final Condition condition, long nonceGroup, long nonce)
274    throws IOException {
275    RegionAction.Builder builder =
276      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(RegionAction.newBuilder(), regionName);
277    builder.setAtomic(true);
278
279    boolean hasNonce = false;
280    ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder = ClientProtos.Action.newBuilder();
281    MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder = MutationProto.newBuilder();
282    for (Mutation mutation : rowMutations.getMutations()) {
283      mutationBuilder.clear();
284      MutationProto mp;
285      if (mutation instanceof Increment || mutation instanceof Append) {
286        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder, nonce);
287        hasNonce = true;
288      } else {
289        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutation(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder);
290      }
291      actionBuilder.clear();
292      actionBuilder.setMutation(mp);
293      builder.addAction(actionBuilder.build());
294    }
295
296    if (condition != null) {
297      builder.setCondition(condition);
298    }
299
300    MultiRequest.Builder multiRequestBuilder = MultiRequest.newBuilder();
301    if (hasNonce) {
302      multiRequestBuilder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
303    }
304
305    return multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build()).build();
306  }
307
308  /**
309   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a put
310   * @return a mutate request
311   */
312  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Put put)
313    throws IOException {
314    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
315    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
316    builder.setRegion(region);
317    builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, put, MutationProto.newBuilder()));
318    return builder.build();
319  }
320
321  /**
322   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for an append
323   * @return a mutate request
324   */
325  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Append append,
326    long nonceGroup, long nonce) throws IOException {
327    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
328    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
329    builder.setRegion(region);
330    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE && nonceGroup != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
331      builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
332    }
333    builder.setMutation(
334      ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.APPEND, append, MutationProto.newBuilder(), nonce));
335    return builder.build();
336  }
337
338  /**
339   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a client increment
340   * @return a mutate request
341   */
342  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Increment increment,
343    final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) throws IOException {
344    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
345    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
346    builder.setRegion(region);
347    if (nonce != HConstants.NO_NONCE && nonceGroup != HConstants.NO_NONCE) {
348      builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
349    }
350    builder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment,
351      MutationProto.newBuilder(), nonce));
352    return builder.build();
353  }
354
355  /**
356   * Create a protocol buffer MutateRequest for a delete
357   * @return a mutate request
358   */
359  public static MutateRequest buildMutateRequest(final byte[] regionName, final Delete delete)
360    throws IOException {
361    MutateRequest.Builder builder = MutateRequest.newBuilder();
362    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
363    builder.setRegion(region);
364    builder.setMutation(
365      ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete, MutationProto.newBuilder()));
366    return builder.build();
367  }
368
369  public static RegionAction.Builder getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(
370    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final byte[] regionName) {
371    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
372    regionActionBuilder.setRegion(region);
373    return regionActionBuilder;
374  }
375
376  /**
377   * Create a protocol buffer ScanRequest for a client Scan
378   * @return a scan request
379   */
380  public static ScanRequest buildScanRequest(byte[] regionName, Scan scan, int numberOfRows,
381    boolean closeScanner) throws IOException {
382    ScanRequest.Builder builder = ScanRequest.newBuilder();
383    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
384    builder.setNumberOfRows(numberOfRows);
385    builder.setCloseScanner(closeScanner);
386    builder.setRegion(region);
387    builder.setScan(ProtobufUtil.toScan(scan));
388    builder.setClientHandlesPartials(true);
389    builder.setClientHandlesHeartbeats(true);
390    builder.setTrackScanMetrics(scan.isScanMetricsEnabled());
391    if (scan.getLimit() > 0) {
392      builder.setLimitOfRows(scan.getLimit());
393    }
394    return builder.build();
395  }
396
397  /**
398   * Create a protocol buffer ScanRequest for a scanner id
399   * @return a scan request
400   */
401  public static ScanRequest buildScanRequest(long scannerId, int numberOfRows, boolean closeScanner,
402    boolean trackMetrics) {
403    ScanRequest.Builder builder = ScanRequest.newBuilder();
404    builder.setNumberOfRows(numberOfRows);
405    builder.setCloseScanner(closeScanner);
406    builder.setScannerId(scannerId);
407    builder.setClientHandlesPartials(true);
408    builder.setClientHandlesHeartbeats(true);
409    builder.setTrackScanMetrics(trackMetrics);
410    return builder.build();
411  }
412
413  /**
414   * Create a protocol buffer ScanRequest for a scanner id
415   * @return a scan request
416   */
417  public static ScanRequest buildScanRequest(long scannerId, int numberOfRows, boolean closeScanner,
418    long nextCallSeq, boolean trackMetrics, boolean renew, int limitOfRows) {
419    ScanRequest.Builder builder = ScanRequest.newBuilder();
420    builder.setNumberOfRows(numberOfRows);
421    builder.setCloseScanner(closeScanner);
422    builder.setScannerId(scannerId);
423    builder.setNextCallSeq(nextCallSeq);
424    builder.setClientHandlesPartials(true);
425    builder.setClientHandlesHeartbeats(true);
426    builder.setTrackScanMetrics(trackMetrics);
427    builder.setRenew(renew);
428    if (limitOfRows > 0) {
429      builder.setLimitOfRows(limitOfRows);
430    }
431    return builder.build();
432  }
433
434  /**
435   * Create a protocol buffer bulk load request
436   * @return a bulk load request
437   */
438  public static BulkLoadHFileRequest buildBulkLoadHFileRequest(
439    final List<Pair<byte[], String>> familyPaths, final byte[] regionName, boolean assignSeqNum,
440    final Token<?> userToken, final String bulkToken) {
441    return buildBulkLoadHFileRequest(familyPaths, regionName, assignSeqNum, userToken, bulkToken,
442      false, null, true);
443  }
444
445  /**
446   * Create a protocol buffer bulk load request
447   * @return a bulk load request
448   */
449  public static BulkLoadHFileRequest buildBulkLoadHFileRequest(
450    final List<Pair<byte[], String>> familyPaths, final byte[] regionName, boolean assignSeqNum,
451    final Token<?> userToken, final String bulkToken, boolean copyFiles, List<String> clusterIds,
452    boolean replicate) {
453    RegionSpecifier region =
454      RequestConverter.buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
455
456    ClientProtos.DelegationToken protoDT = null;
457    if (userToken != null) {
458      protoDT = ClientProtos.DelegationToken.newBuilder()
459        .setIdentifier(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(userToken.getIdentifier()))
460        .setPassword(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(userToken.getPassword()))
461        .setKind(userToken.getKind().toString()).setService(userToken.getService().toString())
462        .build();
463    }
464
465    List<ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.FamilyPath> protoFamilyPaths =
466      new ArrayList<>(familyPaths.size());
467    if (!familyPaths.isEmpty()) {
468      ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.FamilyPath.Builder pathBuilder =
469        ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.FamilyPath.newBuilder();
470      for (Pair<byte[], String> el : familyPaths) {
471        protoFamilyPaths.add(pathBuilder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(el.getFirst()))
472          .setPath(el.getSecond()).build());
473      }
474      pathBuilder.clear();
475    }
476
477    BulkLoadHFileRequest.Builder request = ClientProtos.BulkLoadHFileRequest.newBuilder()
478      .setRegion(region).setAssignSeqNum(assignSeqNum).addAllFamilyPath(protoFamilyPaths);
479    if (userToken != null) {
480      request.setFsToken(protoDT);
481    }
482    if (bulkToken != null) {
483      request.setBulkToken(bulkToken);
484    }
485    request.setCopyFile(copyFiles);
486    if (clusterIds != null) {
487      request.addAllClusterIds(clusterIds);
488    }
489    request.setReplicate(replicate);
490    return request.build();
491  }
492
493  /**
494   * Create a protocol buffer multi request for a list of actions. Propagates Actions original
495   * index. The passed in multiRequestBuilder will be populated with region actions.
496   * @param regionName          The region name of the actions.
497   * @param actions             The actions that are grouped by the same region name.
498   * @param multiRequestBuilder The multiRequestBuilder to be populated with region actions.
499   * @param regionActionBuilder regionActionBuilder to be used to build region action.
500   * @param actionBuilder       actionBuilder to be used to build action.
501   * @param mutationBuilder     mutationBuilder to be used to build mutation.
502   * @param nonceGroup          nonceGroup to be applied.
503   * @param indexMap            Map of created RegionAction to the original index for a
504   *                            RowMutations/CheckAndMutate within the original list of actions
505   */
506  public static void buildRegionActions(final byte[] regionName, final List<Action> actions,
507    final MultiRequest.Builder multiRequestBuilder, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
508    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder,
509    long nonceGroup, final Map<Integer, Integer> indexMap) throws IOException {
510    regionActionBuilder.clear();
511    RegionAction.Builder builder =
512      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(regionActionBuilder, regionName);
513    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.Builder cpBuilder = null;
514    boolean hasNonce = false;
515    List<Action> rowMutationsList = new ArrayList<>();
516    List<Action> checkAndMutates = new ArrayList<>();
517
518    for (Action action : actions) {
519      Row row = action.getAction();
520      actionBuilder.clear();
521      actionBuilder.setIndex(action.getOriginalIndex());
522      mutationBuilder.clear();
523      if (row instanceof Get) {
524        Get g = (Get) row;
525        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(g)));
526      } else if (row instanceof Put) {
527        builder.addAction(actionBuilder
528          .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, (Put) row, mutationBuilder)));
529      } else if (row instanceof Delete) {
530        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
531          ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, (Delete) row, mutationBuilder)));
532      } else if (row instanceof Append) {
533        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.APPEND,
534          (Append) row, mutationBuilder, action.getNonce())));
535        hasNonce = true;
536      } else if (row instanceof Increment) {
537        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.INCREMENT,
538          (Increment) row, mutationBuilder, action.getNonce())));
539        hasNonce = true;
540      } else if (row instanceof RegionCoprocessorServiceExec) {
541        RegionCoprocessorServiceExec exec = (RegionCoprocessorServiceExec) row;
542        // DUMB COPY!!! FIX!!! Done to copy from c.g.p.ByteString to shaded ByteString.
543        org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.ByteString value =
544          org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeByteOperations
545            .unsafeWrap(exec.getRequest().toByteArray());
546        if (cpBuilder == null) {
547          cpBuilder = ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.newBuilder();
548        } else {
549          cpBuilder.clear();
550        }
551        builder.addAction(actionBuilder
552          .setServiceCall(cpBuilder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(exec.getRow()))
553            .setServiceName(exec.getMethod().getService().getFullName())
554            .setMethodName(exec.getMethod().getName()).setRequest(value)));
555      } else if (row instanceof RowMutations) {
556        rowMutationsList.add(action);
557      } else if (row instanceof CheckAndMutate) {
558        checkAndMutates.add(action);
559      } else {
560        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Multi doesn't support " + row.getClass().getName());
561      }
562    }
563    if (!multiRequestBuilder.hasNonceGroup() && hasNonce) {
564      multiRequestBuilder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
565    }
566    if (builder.getActionCount() > 0) {
567      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
568    }
569
570    // Process RowMutations here. We can not process it in the big loop above because
571    // it will corrupt the sequence order maintained in cells.
572    // RowMutations is a set of Puts and/or Deletes all to be applied atomically
573    // on the one row. We do separate RegionAction for each RowMutations.
574    // We maintain a map to keep track of this RegionAction and the original Action index.
575    for (Action action : rowMutationsList) {
576      builder.clear();
577      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(builder, regionName);
578
579      buildRegionAction((RowMutations) action.getAction(), builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
580      builder.setAtomic(true);
581
582      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
583
584      // This rowMutations region action is at (multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1)
585      // in the overall multiRequest.
586      indexMap.put(multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1, action.getOriginalIndex());
587    }
588
589    // Process CheckAndMutate here. Similar to RowMutations, we do separate RegionAction for each
590    // CheckAndMutate and maintain a map to keep track of this RegionAction and the original
591    // Action index.
592    for (Action action : checkAndMutates) {
593      builder.clear();
594      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(builder, regionName);
595
596      CheckAndMutate cam = (CheckAndMutate) action.getAction();
597      builder
598        .setCondition(ProtobufUtil.toCondition(cam.getRow(), cam.getFamily(), cam.getQualifier(),
599          cam.getCompareOp(), cam.getValue(), cam.getFilter(), cam.getTimeRange()));
600
601      if (cam.getAction() instanceof Put) {
602        actionBuilder.clear();
603        mutationBuilder.clear();
604        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
605          ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.PUT, (Put) cam.getAction(), mutationBuilder)));
606      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Delete) {
607        actionBuilder.clear();
608        mutationBuilder.clear();
609        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
610          ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, (Delete) cam.getAction(), mutationBuilder)));
611      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof RowMutations) {
612        buildRegionAction((RowMutations) cam.getAction(), builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
613        builder.setAtomic(true);
614      } else {
615        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
616          "CheckAndMutate doesn't support " + cam.getAction().getClass().getName());
617      }
618
619      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
620
621      // This CheckAndMutate region action is at (multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1)
622      // in the overall multiRequest.
623      indexMap.put(multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1, action.getOriginalIndex());
624    }
625  }
626
627  private static void buildRegionAction(final RowMutations rowMutations,
628    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder,
629    final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder) throws IOException {
630    for (Mutation mutation : rowMutations.getMutations()) {
631      MutationType mutateType;
632      if (mutation instanceof Put) {
633        mutateType = MutationType.PUT;
634      } else if (mutation instanceof Delete) {
635        mutateType = MutationType.DELETE;
636      } else {
637        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
638          "RowMutations supports only put and delete, not " + mutation.getClass().getName());
639      }
640      mutationBuilder.clear();
641      MutationProto mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutation(mutateType, mutation, mutationBuilder);
642      actionBuilder.clear();
643      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(mp).build());
644    }
645  }
646
647  /**
648   * Create a protocol buffer multirequest with NO data for a list of actions (data is carried
649   * otherwise than via protobuf). This means it just notes attributes, whether to write the WAL,
650   * etc., and the presence in protobuf serves as place holder for the data which is coming along
651   * otherwise. Note that Get is different. It does not contain 'data' and is always carried by
652   * protobuf. We return references to the data by adding them to the passed in <code>data</code>
653   * param.
654   * <p>
655   * Propagates Actions original index.
656   * <p>
657   * The passed in multiRequestBuilder will be populated with region actions.
658   * @param regionName          The region name of the actions.
659   * @param actions             The actions that are grouped by the same region name.
660   * @param cells               Place to stuff references to actual data.
661   * @param multiRequestBuilder The multiRequestBuilder to be populated with region actions.
662   * @param regionActionBuilder regionActionBuilder to be used to build region action.
663   * @param actionBuilder       actionBuilder to be used to build action.
664   * @param mutationBuilder     mutationBuilder to be used to build mutation.
665   * @param nonceGroup          nonceGroup to be applied.
666   * @param indexMap            Map of created RegionAction to the original index for a
667   *                            RowMutations/CheckAndMutate within the original list of actions
668   */
669  public static void buildNoDataRegionActions(final byte[] regionName,
670    final Iterable<Action> actions, final List<CellScannable> cells,
671    final MultiRequest.Builder multiRequestBuilder, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
672    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder,
673    long nonceGroup, final Map<Integer, Integer> indexMap) throws IOException {
674    regionActionBuilder.clear();
675    RegionAction.Builder builder =
676      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(regionActionBuilder, regionName);
677    ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.Builder cpBuilder = null;
678    boolean hasNonce = false;
679    List<Action> rowMutationsList = new ArrayList<>();
680    List<Action> checkAndMutates = new ArrayList<>();
681
682    for (Action action : actions) {
683      Row row = action.getAction();
684      actionBuilder.clear();
685      actionBuilder.setIndex(action.getOriginalIndex());
686      mutationBuilder.clear();
687      if (row instanceof Get) {
688        Get g = (Get) row;
689        builder.addAction(actionBuilder.setGet(ProtobufUtil.toGet(g)));
690      } else if (row instanceof Put) {
691        buildNoDataRegionAction((Put) row, cells, builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
692      } else if (row instanceof Delete) {
693        buildNoDataRegionAction((Delete) row, cells, builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
694      } else if (row instanceof Append) {
695        buildNoDataRegionAction((Append) row, cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder,
696          mutationBuilder);
697        hasNonce = true;
698      } else if (row instanceof Increment) {
699        buildNoDataRegionAction((Increment) row, cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder,
700          mutationBuilder);
701        hasNonce = true;
702      } else if (row instanceof RegionCoprocessorServiceExec) {
703        RegionCoprocessorServiceExec exec = (RegionCoprocessorServiceExec) row;
704        // DUMB COPY!!! FIX!!! Done to copy from c.g.p.ByteString to shaded ByteString.
705        org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.ByteString value =
706          org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeByteOperations
707            .unsafeWrap(exec.getRequest().toByteArray());
708        if (cpBuilder == null) {
709          cpBuilder = ClientProtos.CoprocessorServiceCall.newBuilder();
710        } else {
711          cpBuilder.clear();
712        }
713        builder.addAction(actionBuilder
714          .setServiceCall(cpBuilder.setRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(exec.getRow()))
715            .setServiceName(exec.getMethod().getService().getFullName())
716            .setMethodName(exec.getMethod().getName()).setRequest(value)));
717      } else if (row instanceof RowMutations) {
718        rowMutationsList.add(action);
719      } else if (row instanceof CheckAndMutate) {
720        checkAndMutates.add(action);
721      } else {
722        throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Multi doesn't support " + row.getClass().getName());
723      }
724    }
725    if (builder.getActionCount() > 0) {
726      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
727    }
728
729    // Process RowMutations here. We can not process it in the big loop above because
730    // it will corrupt the sequence order maintained in cells.
731    // RowMutations is a set of Puts and/or Deletes all to be applied atomically
732    // on the one row. We do separate RegionAction for each RowMutations.
733    // We maintain a map to keep track of this RegionAction and the original Action index.
734    for (Action action : rowMutationsList) {
735      builder.clear();
736      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(builder, regionName);
737
738      boolean hasIncrementOrAppend = buildNoDataRegionAction((RowMutations) action.getAction(),
739        cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
740      if (hasIncrementOrAppend) {
741        hasNonce = true;
742      }
743      builder.setAtomic(true);
744
745      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
746
747      // This rowMutations region action is at (multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1)
748      // in the overall multiRequest.
749      indexMap.put(multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1, action.getOriginalIndex());
750    }
751
752    // Process CheckAndMutate here. Similar to RowMutations, we do separate RegionAction for each
753    // CheckAndMutate and maintain a map to keep track of this RegionAction and the original
754    // Action index.
755    for (Action action : checkAndMutates) {
756      builder.clear();
757      getRegionActionBuilderWithRegion(builder, regionName);
758
759      CheckAndMutate cam = (CheckAndMutate) action.getAction();
760      builder
761        .setCondition(ProtobufUtil.toCondition(cam.getRow(), cam.getFamily(), cam.getQualifier(),
762          cam.getCompareOp(), cam.getValue(), cam.getFilter(), cam.getTimeRange()));
763
764      if (cam.getAction() instanceof Put) {
765        actionBuilder.clear();
766        mutationBuilder.clear();
767        buildNoDataRegionAction((Put) cam.getAction(), cells, builder, actionBuilder,
768          mutationBuilder);
769      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Delete) {
770        actionBuilder.clear();
771        mutationBuilder.clear();
772        buildNoDataRegionAction((Delete) cam.getAction(), cells, builder, actionBuilder,
773          mutationBuilder);
774      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Increment) {
775        actionBuilder.clear();
776        mutationBuilder.clear();
777        buildNoDataRegionAction((Increment) cam.getAction(), cells, action.getNonce(), builder,
778          actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
779        hasNonce = true;
780      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof Append) {
781        actionBuilder.clear();
782        mutationBuilder.clear();
783        buildNoDataRegionAction((Append) cam.getAction(), cells, action.getNonce(), builder,
784          actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
785        hasNonce = true;
786      } else if (cam.getAction() instanceof RowMutations) {
787        boolean hasIncrementOrAppend = buildNoDataRegionAction((RowMutations) cam.getAction(),
788          cells, action.getNonce(), builder, actionBuilder, mutationBuilder);
789        if (hasIncrementOrAppend) {
790          hasNonce = true;
791        }
792        builder.setAtomic(true);
793      } else {
794        throw new DoNotRetryIOException(
795          "CheckAndMutate doesn't support " + cam.getAction().getClass().getName());
796      }
797
798      multiRequestBuilder.addRegionAction(builder.build());
799
800      // This CheckAndMutate region action is at (multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1)
801      // in the overall multiRequest.
802      indexMap.put(multiRequestBuilder.getRegionActionCount() - 1, action.getOriginalIndex());
803    }
804
805    if (!multiRequestBuilder.hasNonceGroup() && hasNonce) {
806      multiRequestBuilder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
807    }
808  }
809
810  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Put put, final List<CellScannable> cells,
811    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder,
812    final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder) throws IOException {
813    cells.add(put);
814    regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder
815      .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.PUT, put, mutationBuilder)));
816  }
817
818  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Delete delete, final List<CellScannable> cells,
819    final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder, final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder,
820    final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder) throws IOException {
821    int size = delete.size();
822    // Note that a legitimate Delete may have a size of zero; i.e. a Delete that has nothing
823    // in it but the row to delete. In this case, the current implementation does not make
824    // a KeyValue to represent a delete-of-all-the-row until we serialize... For such cases
825    // where the size returned is zero, we will send the Delete fully pb'd rather than have
826    // metadata only in the pb and then send the kv along the side in cells.
827    if (size > 0) {
828      cells.add(delete);
829      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder
830        .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.DELETE, delete, mutationBuilder)));
831    } else {
832      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder
833        .setMutation(ProtobufUtil.toMutation(MutationType.DELETE, delete, mutationBuilder)));
834    }
835  }
836
837  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Increment increment,
838    final List<CellScannable> cells, long nonce, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
839    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder)
840    throws IOException {
841    cells.add(increment);
842    regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
843      ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.INCREMENT, increment, mutationBuilder, nonce)));
844  }
845
846  private static void buildNoDataRegionAction(final Append append, final List<CellScannable> cells,
847    long nonce, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
848    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder)
849    throws IOException {
850    cells.add(append);
851    regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(
852      ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(MutationType.APPEND, append, mutationBuilder, nonce)));
853  }
854
855  /** Returns whether or not the rowMutations has a Increment or Append */
856  private static boolean buildNoDataRegionAction(final RowMutations rowMutations,
857    final List<CellScannable> cells, long nonce, final RegionAction.Builder regionActionBuilder,
858    final ClientProtos.Action.Builder actionBuilder, final MutationProto.Builder mutationBuilder)
859    throws IOException {
860    boolean ret = false;
861    for (Mutation mutation : rowMutations.getMutations()) {
862      mutationBuilder.clear();
863      MutationProto mp;
864      if (mutation instanceof Increment || mutation instanceof Append) {
865        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder,
866          nonce);
867        ret = true;
868      } else {
869        mp = ProtobufUtil.toMutationNoData(getMutationType(mutation), mutation, mutationBuilder);
870      }
871      cells.add(mutation);
872      actionBuilder.clear();
873      regionActionBuilder.addAction(actionBuilder.setMutation(mp).build());
874    }
875    return ret;
876  }
877
878  private static MutationType getMutationType(Mutation mutation) {
879    if (mutation instanceof Put) {
880      return MutationType.PUT;
881    } else if (mutation instanceof Delete) {
882      return MutationType.DELETE;
883    } else if (mutation instanceof Increment) {
884      return MutationType.INCREMENT;
885    } else {
886      return MutationType.APPEND;
887    }
888  }
889

894   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest for a given region name
895   * @param regionName the name of the region to get info
896   * @return a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest
897   */
898  public static GetRegionInfoRequest buildGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName) {
899    return buildGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName, false);
900  }
901
902  /**
903   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest for a given region name
904   * @param regionName             the name of the region to get info
905   * @param includeCompactionState indicate if the compaction state is requested
906   * @return a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest
907   */
908  public static GetRegionInfoRequest buildGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName,
909    final boolean includeCompactionState) {
910    return buildGetRegionInfoRequest(regionName, includeCompactionState, false);
911  }
912
913  /**
914   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest,
915   * @param regionName             the name of the region to get info
916   * @param includeCompactionState indicate if the compaction state is requested
917   * @param includeBestSplitRow    indicate if the bestSplitRow is requested
918   * @return protocol buffer GetRegionInfoRequest
919   */
920  public static GetRegionInfoRequest buildGetRegionInfoRequest(final byte[] regionName,
921    final boolean includeCompactionState, boolean includeBestSplitRow) {
922    GetRegionInfoRequest.Builder builder = GetRegionInfoRequest.newBuilder();
923    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
924    builder.setRegion(region);
925    if (includeCompactionState) {
926      builder.setCompactionState(includeCompactionState);
927    }
928    if (includeBestSplitRow) {
929      builder.setBestSplitRow(includeBestSplitRow);
930    }
931    return builder.build();
932  }

935   * Create a protocol buffer GetRegionLoadRequest for all regions/regions of a table.
936   * @param tableName the table for which regionLoad should be obtained from RS
937   * @return a protocol buffer GetRegionLoadRequest
938   */
939  public static GetRegionLoadRequest buildGetRegionLoadRequest(final TableName tableName) {
940    GetRegionLoadRequest.Builder builder = GetRegionLoadRequest.newBuilder();
941    if (tableName != null) {
942      builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName));
943    }
944    return builder.build();
945  }

952    return GetOnlineRegionRequest.newBuilder().build();
953  }

957   * @param regionName the name of the region to get info
958   * @return a protocol buffer FlushRegionRequest
959   */
960  public static FlushRegionRequest buildFlushRegionRequest(final byte[] regionName) {
961    return buildFlushRegionRequest(regionName, null, false);
962  }

964  /**
965   * Create a protocol buffer FlushRegionRequest for a given region name
966   * @param regionName   the name of the region to get info
967   * @param columnFamily column family within a region
968   * @return a protocol buffer FlushRegionRequest
969   */
970  public static FlushRegionRequest buildFlushRegionRequest(final byte[] regionName,
971    byte[] columnFamily, boolean writeFlushWALMarker) {
972    FlushRegionRequest.Builder builder = FlushRegionRequest.newBuilder();
973    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
974    builder.setRegion(region);
975    builder.setWriteFlushWalMarker(writeFlushWALMarker);
976    if (columnFamily != null) {
977      builder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(columnFamily));
978    }
979    return builder.build();
980  }

982  /**
983   * Create a protocol buffer OpenRegionRequest for a given region
984   * @param server       the serverName for the RPC
985   * @param region       the region to open
986   * @param favoredNodes a list of favored nodes
987   * @return a protocol buffer OpenRegionRequest
988   */
989  public static OpenRegionRequest buildOpenRegionRequest(ServerName server, final RegionInfo region,
990    List<ServerName> favoredNodes) {
991    OpenRegionRequest.Builder builder = OpenRegionRequest.newBuilder();
992    builder.addOpenInfo(buildRegionOpenInfo(region, favoredNodes, -1L));
993    if (server != null) {
994      builder.setServerStartCode(server.getStartcode());
995    }
996    builder.setMasterSystemTime(EnvironmentEdgeManager.currentTime());
997    return builder.build();
998  }
999
1000  /**
1001   * Create a protocol buffer UpdateFavoredNodesRequest to update a list of favorednode mappings
1002   * @param updateRegionInfos a list of favored node mappings
1003   * @return a protocol buffer UpdateFavoredNodesRequest
1004   */
1005  public static UpdateFavoredNodesRequest buildUpdateFavoredNodesRequest(
1006    final List<Pair<RegionInfo, List<ServerName>>> updateRegionInfos) {
1007    UpdateFavoredNodesRequest.Builder ubuilder = UpdateFavoredNodesRequest.newBuilder();
1008    if (updateRegionInfos != null && !updateRegionInfos.isEmpty()) {
1009      RegionUpdateInfo.Builder builder = RegionUpdateInfo.newBuilder();
1010      for (Pair<RegionInfo, List<ServerName>> pair : updateRegionInfos) {
1011        builder.setRegion(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(pair.getFirst()));
1012        for (ServerName server : pair.getSecond()) {
1013          builder.addFavoredNodes(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server));
1014        }
1015        ubuilder.addUpdateInfo(builder.build());
1016        builder.clear();
1017      }
1018    }
1019    return ubuilder.build();
1020  }
1021
1022  /**
1023   * Create a WarmupRegionRequest for a given region name
1024   * @param regionInfo Region we are warming up
1025   */
1026  public static WarmupRegionRequest buildWarmupRegionRequest(final RegionInfo regionInfo) {
1027    WarmupRegionRequest.Builder builder = WarmupRegionRequest.newBuilder();
1028    builder.setRegionInfo(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(regionInfo));
1029    return builder.build();
1030  }
1031
1032  /**
1033   * Create a CompactRegionRequest for a given region name
1034   * @param regionName the name of the region to get info
1035   * @param major      indicator if it is a major compaction
1036   * @return a CompactRegionRequest
1037   */
1038  public static CompactRegionRequest buildCompactRegionRequest(byte[] regionName, boolean major,
1039    byte[] columnFamily) {
1040    CompactRegionRequest.Builder builder = CompactRegionRequest.newBuilder();
1041    RegionSpecifier region = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, regionName);
1042    builder.setRegion(region);
1043    builder.setMajor(major);
1044    if (columnFamily != null) {
1045      builder.setFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(columnFamily));
1046    }
1047    return builder.build();
1048  }
1049
1050  /**
1051   * Create a new RollWALWriterRequest
1052   * @return a ReplicateWALEntryRequest
1053   */
1054  public static RollWALWriterRequest buildRollWALWriterRequest() {
1055    return RollWALWriterRequest.getDefaultInstance();
1056  }

1079  /**
1080   * Convert a byte array to a protocol buffer RegionSpecifier
1081   * @param type  the region specifier type
1082   * @param value the region specifier byte array value
1083   * @return a protocol buffer RegionSpecifier
1084   */
1085  public static RegionSpecifier buildRegionSpecifier(final RegionSpecifierType type,
1086    final byte[] value) {
1087    RegionSpecifier.Builder regionBuilder = RegionSpecifier.newBuilder();
1088    regionBuilder.setValue(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(value));
1089    regionBuilder.setType(type);
1090    return regionBuilder.build();
1091  }

1163  public static MergeTableRegionsRequest buildMergeTableRegionsRequest(
1164    final byte[][] encodedNameOfdaughaterRegions, final boolean forcible, final long nonceGroup,
1165    final long nonce) throws DeserializationException {
1166    MergeTableRegionsRequest.Builder builder = MergeTableRegionsRequest.newBuilder();
1167    for (int i = 0; i < encodedNameOfdaughaterRegions.length; i++) {
1168      builder.addRegion(buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME,
1169        encodedNameOfdaughaterRegions[i]));
1170    }
1171    builder.setForcible(forcible);
1172    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
1173    builder.setNonce(nonce);
1174    return builder.build();
1175  }

1186    builder.setNonce(nonce);
1187    return builder.build();
1188  }

1289   */
1290  public static CreateTableRequest buildCreateTableRequest(final TableDescriptor tableDescriptor,
1291    final byte[][] splitKeys, final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) {
1292    CreateTableRequest.Builder builder = CreateTableRequest.newBuilder();
1293    builder.setTableSchema(ProtobufUtil.toTableSchema(tableDescriptor));
1294    if (splitKeys != null) {
1295      for (byte[] key : splitKeys) {
1296        builder.addSplitKeys(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(key));
1297      }
1298    }
1299    builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup);
1300    builder.setNonce(nonce);
1301    return builder.build();
1302  }

1370    return builder.build();
1371  }

1399  /**
1400   * Creates a protocol buffer SetTableStateInMetaRequest
1401   * @param state table state to update in Meta
1402   * @return a SetTableStateInMetaRequest
1403   */
1404  public static SetTableStateInMetaRequest buildSetTableStateInMetaRequest(final TableState state) {
1405    return SetTableStateInMetaRequest.newBuilder().setTableState(state.convert())
1406      .setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(state.getTableName())).build();
1407  }
1408
1409  /**
1410   * Creates a protocol buffer SetRegionStateInMetaRequest
1411   * @param nameOrEncodedName2State list of regions states to update in Meta
1412   * @return a SetRegionStateInMetaRequest
1413   */
1414  public static SetRegionStateInMetaRequest
1415    buildSetRegionStateInMetaRequest(Map<String, RegionState.State> nameOrEncodedName2State) {
1416    SetRegionStateInMetaRequest.Builder builder = SetRegionStateInMetaRequest.newBuilder();
1417    nameOrEncodedName2State.forEach((name, state) -> {
1418      byte[] bytes = Bytes.toBytes(name);
1419      RegionSpecifier spec;
1420      if (RegionInfo.isEncodedRegionName(bytes)) {
1421        spec = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, bytes);
1422      } else {
1423        spec = buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME, bytes);
1424      }
1425      builder.addStates(RegionSpecifierAndState.newBuilder().setRegionSpecifier(spec)
1426        .setState(state.convert()).build());
1427    });
1428    return builder.build();
1429  }

1439      .addTableNames(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName)).build();

1546  /**
1547   * Create a RegionOpenInfo based on given region info and version of offline node
1548   */
1549  public static RegionOpenInfo buildRegionOpenInfo(RegionInfo region, List<ServerName> favoredNodes,
1550    long openProcId) {
1551    RegionOpenInfo.Builder builder = RegionOpenInfo.newBuilder();
1552    builder.setRegion(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(region));
1553    if (favoredNodes != null) {
1554      for (ServerName server : favoredNodes) {
1555        builder.addFavoredNodes(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server));
1556      }
1557    }
1558    builder.setOpenProcId(openProcId);
1559    return builder.build();
1560  }

1562  /**
1563   * Creates a protocol buffer NormalizeRequest
1564   * @return a NormalizeRequest
1565   */
1566  public static NormalizeRequest buildNormalizeRequest(NormalizeTableFilterParams ntfp) {
1567    final NormalizeRequest.Builder builder = NormalizeRequest.newBuilder();
1568    if (ntfp.getTableNames() != null) {
1569      builder.addAllTableNames(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableNameList(ntfp.getTableNames()));
1570    }
1571    if (ntfp.getRegex() != null) {
1572      builder.setRegex(ntfp.getRegex());
1573    }
1574    if (ntfp.getNamespace() != null) {
1575      builder.setNamespace(ntfp.getNamespace());
1576    }
1577    return builder.build();
1578  }

1596  /**
1597   * Creates a protocol buffer IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1598   * @param switchType see {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MasterSwitchType}
1599   * @return a IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1600   */
1601  public static IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1602    buildIsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest(MasterSwitchType switchType) {
1603    IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.Builder builder = IsSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.newBuilder();
1604    builder.setSwitchType(convert(switchType));
1605    return builder.build();
1606  }
1607
1608  /**
1609   * Creates a protocol buffer SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1610   * @param enabled     switch is enabled or not
1611   * @param synchronous set switch sync?
1612   * @param switchTypes see {@link org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MasterSwitchType}, it is a list.
1613   * @return a SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest
1614   */
1615  public static SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest buildSetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest(boolean enabled,
1616    boolean synchronous, MasterSwitchType... switchTypes) {
1617    SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.Builder builder = SetSplitOrMergeEnabledRequest.newBuilder();
1618    builder.setEnabled(enabled);
1619    builder.setSynchronous(synchronous);
1620    for (MasterSwitchType switchType : switchTypes) {
1621      builder.addSwitchTypes(convert(switchType));
1622    }
1623    return builder.build();
1624  }
1625
1626  private static MasterProtos.MasterSwitchType convert(MasterSwitchType switchType) {
1627    switch (switchType) {
1628      case SPLIT:
1629        return MasterProtos.MasterSwitchType.SPLIT;
1630      case MERGE:
1631        return MasterProtos.MasterSwitchType.MERGE;
1632      default:
1633        break;
1634    }
1635    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupport switch type:" + switchType);
1636  }
1637
1638  public static ReplicationProtos.AddReplicationPeerRequest buildAddReplicationPeerRequest(
1639    String peerId, ReplicationPeerConfig peerConfig, boolean enabled) {
1640    AddReplicationPeerRequest.Builder builder = AddReplicationPeerRequest.newBuilder();
1641    builder.setPeerId(peerId);
1642    builder.setPeerConfig(ReplicationPeerConfigUtil.convert(peerConfig));
1643    ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.Builder stateBuilder =
1644      ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.newBuilder();
1645    stateBuilder.setState(enabled
1646      ? ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.State.ENABLED
1647      : ReplicationProtos.ReplicationState.State.DISABLED);
1648    builder.setPeerState(stateBuilder.build());
1649    return builder.build();
1650  }
1651
1652  public static ReplicationProtos.RemoveReplicationPeerRequest
1653    buildRemoveReplicationPeerRequest(String peerId) {

1778  public static DecommissionRegionServersRequest
1779    buildDecommissionRegionServersRequest(List<ServerName> servers, boolean offload) {
1780    return DecommissionRegionServersRequest.newBuilder()
1781      .addAllServerName(toProtoServerNames(servers)).setOffload(offload).build();
1782  }
1783
1784  public static RecommissionRegionServerRequest
1785    buildRecommissionRegionServerRequest(ServerName server, List<byte[]> encodedRegionNames) {
1786    RecommissionRegionServerRequest.Builder builder = RecommissionRegionServerRequest.newBuilder();
1787    if (encodedRegionNames != null) {
1788      for (byte[] name : encodedRegionNames) {
1789        builder.addRegion(buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, name));
1790      }
1791    }
1792    return builder.setServerName(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server)).build();
1793  }
1794
1795  private static List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> toProtoServerNames(List<ServerName> servers) {
1796    List<HBaseProtos.ServerName> pbServers = new ArrayList<>(servers.size());
1797    for (ServerName server : servers) {
1798      pbServers.add(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(server));
1799    }
1800    return pbServers;
1801  }
1802
1803  // HBCK2
1804  public static MasterProtos.AssignsRequest toAssignRegionsRequest(List<String> encodedRegionNames,
1805    boolean override) {
1806    MasterProtos.AssignsRequest.Builder b = MasterProtos.AssignsRequest.newBuilder();
1807    return b.addAllRegion(toEncodedRegionNameRegionSpecifiers(encodedRegionNames))
1808      .setOverride(override).build();
1809  }
1810
1811  public static MasterProtos.UnassignsRequest
1812    toUnassignRegionsRequest(List<String> encodedRegionNames, boolean override) {
1813    MasterProtos.UnassignsRequest.Builder b = MasterProtos.UnassignsRequest.newBuilder();
1814    return b.addAllRegion(toEncodedRegionNameRegionSpecifiers(encodedRegionNames))
1815      .setOverride(override).build();
1816  }
1817
1818  public static MasterProtos.ScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest
1819    toScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest(List<ServerName> serverNames) {
1820    MasterProtos.ScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest.Builder builder =
1821      MasterProtos.ScheduleServerCrashProcedureRequest.newBuilder();
1822    serverNames.stream().map(ProtobufUtil::toServerName).forEach(sn -> builder.addServerName(sn));
1823    return builder.build();
1824  }
1825
1826  private static List<RegionSpecifier>
1827    toEncodedRegionNameRegionSpecifiers(List<String> encodedRegionNames) {
1828    return encodedRegionNames.stream()
1829      .map(r -> buildRegionSpecifier(RegionSpecifierType.ENCODED_REGION_NAME, Bytes.toBytes(r)))
1830      .collect(Collectors.toList());
1831  }
1832
1833  /**
1834   * Creates SetSnapshotCleanupRequest for turning on/off auto snapshot cleanup
1835   * @param enabled     Set to <code>true</code> to enable, <code>false</code> to disable.
1836   * @param synchronous If <code>true</code>, it waits until current snapshot cleanup is completed,
1837   *                    if outstanding.
1838   * @return a SetSnapshotCleanupRequest
1839   */
1840  public static SetSnapshotCleanupRequest buildSetSnapshotCleanupRequest(final boolean enabled,
1841    final boolean synchronous) {
1842    return SetSnapshotCleanupRequest.newBuilder().setEnabled(enabled).setSynchronous(synchronous)
1843      .build();
1844  }
1845
1846  /**
1847   * Creates IsSnapshotCleanupEnabledRequest to determine if auto snapshot cleanup based on TTL
1848   * expiration is turned on
1849   */
1850  public static IsSnapshotCleanupEnabledRequest buildIsSnapshotCleanupEnabledRequest() {
1851    return IsSnapshotCleanupEnabledRequest.newBuilder().build();
1852  }
1853
1854  /**
1855   * Build RPC request payload for getLogEntries
1856   * @param filterParams map of filter params
1857   * @param limit        limit for no of records that server returns
1858   * @param logType      type of the log records
1859   * @return request payload {@link HBaseProtos.LogRequest}
1860   */
1861  public static HBaseProtos.LogRequest buildSlowLogResponseRequest(
1862    final Map<String, Object> filterParams, final int limit, final String logType) {
1863    SlowLogResponseRequest.Builder builder = SlowLogResponseRequest.newBuilder();
1864    builder.setLimit(limit);
1865    if (logType.equals("SLOW_LOG")) {
1866      builder.setLogType(SlowLogResponseRequest.LogType.SLOW_LOG);
1867    } else if (logType.equals("LARGE_LOG")) {
1868      builder.setLogType(SlowLogResponseRequest.LogType.LARGE_LOG);
1869    }
1870    boolean filterByAnd = false;
1871    if (MapUtils.isNotEmpty(filterParams)) {
1872      if (filterParams.containsKey("clientAddress")) {
1873        final String clientAddress = (String) filterParams.get("clientAddress");
1874        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(clientAddress)) {
1875          builder.setClientAddress(clientAddress);
1876        }
1877      }
1878      if (filterParams.containsKey("regionName")) {
1879        final String regionName = (String) filterParams.get("regionName");
1880        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(regionName)) {
1881          builder.setRegionName(regionName);
1882        }
1883      }
1884      if (filterParams.containsKey("tableName")) {
1885        final String tableName = (String) filterParams.get("tableName");
1886        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(tableName)) {
1887          builder.setTableName(tableName);
1888        }
1889      }
1890      if (filterParams.containsKey("userName")) {
1891        final String userName = (String) filterParams.get("userName");
1892        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(userName)) {
1893          builder.setUserName(userName);
1894        }
1895      }
1896      if (filterParams.containsKey("filterByOperator")) {
1897        final String filterByOperator = (String) filterParams.get("filterByOperator");
1898        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(filterByOperator)) {
1899          if (filterByOperator.toUpperCase().equals("AND")) {
1900            filterByAnd = true;
1901          }
1902        }
1903      }
1904    }
1905    if (filterByAnd) {
1906      builder.setFilterByOperator(SlowLogResponseRequest.FilterByOperator.AND);
1907    } else {
1908      builder.setFilterByOperator(SlowLogResponseRequest.FilterByOperator.OR);
1909    }
1910    SlowLogResponseRequest slowLogResponseRequest = builder.build();
1911    return HBaseProtos.LogRequest.newBuilder()
1912      .setLogClassName(slowLogResponseRequest.getClass().getName())
1913      .setLogMessage(slowLogResponseRequest.toByteString()).build();
1914  }
1915
1916  /**
1917   * Create a protocol buffer {@link ClearSlowLogResponseRequest}
1918   * @return a protocol buffer ClearSlowLogResponseRequest
1919   */
1920  public static ClearSlowLogResponseRequest buildClearSlowLogResponseRequest() {
1921    return ClearSlowLogResponseRequest.newBuilder().build();
1922  }
1923
1924  public static FlushTableRequest buildFlushTableRequest(final TableName tableName,
1925    final List<byte[]> columnFamilies, final long nonceGroup, final long nonce) {
1926    FlushTableRequest.Builder builder = FlushTableRequest.newBuilder();
1927    builder.setTableName(ProtobufUtil.toProtoTableName(tableName));
1928    if (!columnFamilies.isEmpty()) {
1929      for (byte[] columnFamily : columnFamilies) {
1930        builder.addColumnFamily(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(columnFamily));
1931      }
1932    }
1933    return builder.setNonceGroup(nonceGroup).setNonce(nonce).build();
1934  }
1935
1936}
